entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort Erie

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain changing to periods of rain this morning then changing to periods of snow or rain this afternoon and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
